sqlMap.statement:
SELECT FA.*, FB.BZWKDSTICNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNO, LOUTNAME , LOUTPTRNNAME , LOUTDESC , LOUTPTRNDESC , LASTAMNDHMS , EAIBZWKDSTCD , UAPPLNAME , SYSINTFACNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, LOUTNAME, LOUTPTRNNAME, LOUTDESC , LOUTPTRNDESC , LASTAMNDHMS , EAIBZWKDSTCD , UAPPLNAME , SYSINTFACNAME FROM ( SELECT A.LOUTNAME, A.LOUTPTRNNAME, A.LOUTDESC, B.LOUTPTRNDESC, A.LASTAMNDHMS , A.EAIBZWKDSTCD , A.UAPPLNAME , A.SYSINTFACNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 A, $schemaId$.TSEAITR06 B WHERE A.LOUTPTRNNAME = B.LOUTPTRNNAME AND A.EAIBZWKDSTCD IN (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 where userId =#loginId#)
A.LOUTNAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutName#||'%')
A.EAIBZWKDSTCD LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#||'%')
A.LOUTDESC LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutDesc#||'%')
) TMP1 ) TMP2 WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum# ) FA LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 FB ON FA.EAIBZWKDSTCD = FB.EAIBZWKDSTCD ORDER BY 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD IN (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 where userId =#loginId#)
LOUTNAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutName#||'%')
EAIBZWKDSTCD LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#||'%')
LOUTDESC LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutDesc#||'%')

select 0 AS "level" , LoutItemIDName "id" , ParntLoutItemIDName "parent" , 'true' AS "expanded" , CASE LoutItemNodePtrnIDName WHEN 2203 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END "isLeaf" , LoutItemName LOUTITEMPATH , LOUTNAME AS LOUTNAME , LOUTITEMIDNAME AS LOUTITEMIDNAME , LOUTITEMNAME AS LOUTITEMNAME , LOUTITEMDESC AS LOUTITEMDESC , LOUTITEMSERNO AS LOUTITEMSERNO , LOUTITEMLENCNT AS LOUTITEMLENCNT , DECPTLENCNT AS DECPTLENCNT , LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME AS LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME , LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME AS LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME , (CASE LoutItemNodePtrnIDName WHEN 2201 THEN 'MESSAGE' WHEN 2202 THEN 'GROUP' WHEN 2203 THEN 'FIELD' WHEN 2204 THEN 'ATTR' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END) LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDDESC , (CASE LoutItemPtrnIDName WHEN 2100 THEN 'UNKNOWN' WHEN 2101 THEN 'STRING' WHEN 2102 THEN 'INT' WHEN 2103 THEN 'LONG' WHEN 2104 THEN 'SHORT' WHEN 2105 THEN 'DOUBLE' WHEN 2106 THEN 'FLOAT' WHEN 2107 THEN 'CHAR' WHEN 2108 THEN 'BYTE' WHEN 2109 THEN 'DATE' WHEN 2110 THEN 'TIME' WHEN 2111 THEN 'TIMESTAMP' WHEN 2112 THEN 'NUMBER' WHEN 2113 THEN 'BYTEARRAY' WHEN 2114 THEN 'NUMERIC' WHEN 2115 THEN 'PACKDECIMAL' WHEN 2116 THEN 'OBJECT' WHEN 2117 THEN 'BOOLEAN' WHEN 2118 THEN 'BIGDECIMAL' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END )LOUTITEMPTRNIDDESC , PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME AS PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME , LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD AS LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD , LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM AS LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM , LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM AS LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM , LOUTITEMREFINFO2 AS LOUTITEMREFINFO2 from ( select * from $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 where LoutName = #loutName# ) T order by LoutItemSerno
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 SET LASTAMNDHMS = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE LOUTNAME = #loutName#

SELECT LOUTNAME LOUTNAME, LOUTITEMNAME LOUTITEMNAME, LOUTITEMIDNAME LOUTITEMIDNAME, PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME, LOUTITEMDESC LOUTITEMDESC, LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME, LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME, LOUTITEMPATHNAME LOUTITEMPATHNAME, LOUTITEMLENCNT LOUTITEMLENCNT, LOUTITEMREFINFO LOUTITEMREFINFO, LOUTITEMREFINFO2 LOUTITEMREFINFO2, LOUTITEMSERNO LOUTITEMSERNO, LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD, LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM, LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM, LOUTITEMBASCVAL LOUTITEMBASCVAL, LOUTITEMMSKYN LOUTITEMMSKYN, COALESCE(LOUTITEMMASKLENGTH,0) LOUTITEMMASKLENGTH, LYOUTDPTCNT LYOUTDPTCNT, DECPTLENCNT DECPTLENCNT, LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 WHERE LOUTNAME=#loutName# AND LOUTITEMNAME =#loutItemName# AND LOUTITEMSERNO=#loutItemSerno# ORDER BY LOUTITEMIDNAME, LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME = '0' THEN 'FORMAT' ELSE CASE WHEN LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2100' THEN 'GRID' WHEN LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2113' THEN ( CASE WHEN (SELECT LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 L WHERE L.LOUTNAME = O.LOUTNAME AND L.LOUTITEMIDNAME = O.PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME AND L.LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2100' AND (L.LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM = -1 OR L.LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM > 1) ) = '2100' THEN 'COLUMN' ELSE 'FLD' END ) END AS FIELDTYPE , LOUTITEMNAME AS ID , LOUTITEMDESC AS DESC ,CASE WHEN LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME = 'STRING' THEN 'CHAR' LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME = 'BYTEARRAY' THEN 'CHAR' LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME = 'INTEGER' THEN 'DECIMAL' LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME = 'BIGDECIMAL' THEN 'NUMERIC' ELSE 'CHAR' END AS TYPE , LOUTITEMLENCNT AS LEN , DECPTLENCNT AS SCALE , (CASE WHEN LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2100' AND PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME !=0 AND TRIM(LOUTITEMREFINFO2) IS NOT NULL THEN LOUTITEMREFINFO2 WHEN LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2100' AND PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME !=0 AND TRIM(LOUTITEMREFINFO2) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM) ELSE ' ' END) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 WHERE LOUTNAME = #LoutName# ) O WHERE (LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2100' AND (LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM = -1 OR LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM > 1) ) OR (LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = '2113' ) OR (PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR LOUTITEMIDNAME = PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME START WITH PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME = '0'

SELECT ID "id", LOUTDESC "desc", '$schemaId$' "usesystem", TARGETSYSTEM "targetsystem", TRIM(PSVSYSBZWKDSTCD) "group", IOTYPE "ioType", COMMON_SRVCID "servicecode", A.EAISVCNAME "interfacecode" FROM ( SELECT LOUTNAME ID, CASE WHEN SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN 'I' ELSE 'O' END IOTYPE ,CASE WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN '기동' WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'TGT_LAYOUT' THEN '수동' WHEN EAISVCNAME LIKE '%1' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'TGT_LAYOUT' THEN 'CBS' WHEN EAISVCNAME LIKE '%2' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN 'CBS' ELSE '대외' END TARGETSYSTEM ,EAISVCNAME, PSVSYSBZWKDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR02 A JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE02 B ON A.CNVSNNAME = B.CHNGMSGIDNAME WHERE B.EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName# UNION SELECT LOUTNAME ID, CASE WHEN SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN 'I' ELSE 'O' END IOTYPE ,CASE WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN '수동' WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'TGT_LAYOUT' THEN '기동' WHEN EAISVCNAME LIKE '%1' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'TGT_LAYOUT' THEN 'CBS' WHEN EAISVCNAME LIKE '%2' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN 'CBS' ELSE '대외' END TARGETSYSTEM ,EAISVCNAME, PSVSYSBZWKDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR02 A JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE02 B ON A.CNVSNNAME = B.BASCRSPNSCHNGMSGIDNAME WHERE B.EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName# UNION SELECT LOUTNAME ID, CASE WHEN SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN 'IE' ELSE 'OE' END IOTYPE ,CASE WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN '수동' WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'TGT_LAYOUT' THEN '기동' WHEN EAISVCNAME LIKE '%1' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'TGT_LAYOUT' THEN 'CBS' WHEN EAISVCNAME LIKE '%2' AND SOURCRSULTDSTCD = 'SRC_LAYOUT' THEN 'CBS' ELSE '대외' END TARGETSYSTEM ,EAISVCNAME, PSVSYSBZWKDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR02 A JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE02 B ON A.CNVSNNAME = B.ERRRSPNSCHNGMSGIDNAME WHERE B.EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName# UNION SELECT REFMSGIDNAME ID, CASE WHEN REFMSGIDNO = 1 THEN 'I' ELSE 'O' END IOTYPE ,CASE WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND REFMSGIDNO = 1 THEN '기동' WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND REFMSGIDNO = 2 THEN '수동' WHEN PSVINTFACDSTICNAME = 'SYNC' AND REFMSGIDNO = 3 THEN '수동' WHEN REFMSGIDNAME LIKE '%CBS' THEN 'CBS' ELSE '대외' END TARGETSYSTEM ,A.EAISVCNAME, PSVSYSBZWKDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIMS02 A JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE02 B ON A.EAISVCNAME = B.EAISVCNAME WHERE B.EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName# ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT EAISVCNAME , max(decode(COLUMNNAME,'COMMON_SRVCID',COLUMNVALUE,'')) COMMON_SRVCID FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS04 hs04 , $schemaId$.tseaihs05 hs05 where hs04.BZWKSVCKEYNAME =hs05.BZWKSVCKEYNAME group by hs04.BZWKSVCKEYNAME,EAISVCNAME ) HS04 ON A.EAISVCNAME = HS04.EAISVCNAME LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 TR07 ON TR07.LOUTNAME = A.ID ORDER BY 1

SELECT FA.*, FB.BZWKDSTICNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNO, LOUTNAME , LOUTPTRNNAME , LOUTDESC , LOUTPTRNDESC , LASTAMNDHMS , EAIBZWKDSTCD , UAPPLNAME , SYSINTFACNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, LOUTNAME, LOUTPTRNNAME, LOUTDESC , LOUTPTRNDESC , LASTAMNDHMS , EAIBZWKDSTCD , UAPPLNAME , SYSINTFACNAME FROM ( SELECT A.LOUTNAME, A.LOUTPTRNNAME, A.LOUTDESC, B.LOUTPTRNDESC, A.LASTAMNDHMS , A.EAIBZWKDSTCD , A.UAPPLNAME , A.SYSINTFACNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 A, $schemaId$.TSEAITR06 B WHERE A.LOUTPTRNNAME = B.LOUTPTRNNAME
UPPER(A.LOUTNAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutName#||'%')
UPPER(A.EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#||'%')
UPPER(A.LOUTDESC) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutDesc#||'%')
) TMP1 ) TMP2 WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum# ) FA LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 FB ON FA.EAIBZWKDSTCD = FB.EAIBZWKDSTCD ORDER BY 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR07
UPPER(LOUTNAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutName#||'%')
UPPER(EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#||'%')
UPPER(LOUTDESC) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchLoutDesc#||'%')

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAITR09 ( LOGPRCSSSERNO, EXECUTEDATE ,EXECUTECLASS,EXECUTEMETHOD,EXECUTEUSER,SENDXMLCMNT,SENDAMNDHMS ) VALUES ( #logPrcssSerno#, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,#executeClass#,#executeMethod#,#executeUser#,#sendXmlCmnt#, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2') )
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAITR09 SET RECVAMNDHMS=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2'), RECVRSLT=#recvRslt#, RECVFAILCMNT=#recvFailCmnt# WHERE LOGPRCSSSERNO = #logPrcssSerno#
DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 WHERE LOUTNAME=#loutName# AND LOUTITEMNAME =#loutItemName# AND LOUTITEMSERNO=#loutItemSerno#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 ( LOUTNAME, LOUTITEMNAME, LOUTITEMIDNAME, PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME, LOUTITEMDESC, LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME, LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME, LOUTITEMPATHNAME, LOUTITEMLENCNT, LOUTITEMREFINFO, LOUTITEMREFINFO2, LOUTITEMSERNO, LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD, LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM, LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM, LOUTITEMBASCVAL, LOUTITEMMSKYN, LOUTITEMMASKLENGTH, LYOUTDPTCNT, DECPTLENCNT, LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME ) VALUES ( #loutName#, #loutItemName#, #loutItemIDName#, #parntLoutItemIDName#, #loutItemDesc#, #loutItemNodePtrnIDName#, #loutItemPtrnIDName#, #loutItemPathName#, #loutItemLenCnt#, #loutItemRefInfo#, #loutItemRefInfo2#, #loutItemSerno#, #loutItemOccurPtrnDstcd#, #loutItemMaxOccurNoitm#, #loutItemMinOccurNoitm#, #loutItemBascVal#, #loutItemMskYn#, #loutItemMaskLength#, #lyoutDptCnt#, #decptLenCnt#, #lyoutItemRefPtrnIDName# )

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 SET LOUTNAME = #loutName#, LOUTITEMNAME = #loutItemName#, LOUTITEMIDNAME = #loutItemIDName#, PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME = #parntLoutItemIDName#, LOUTITEMDESC = #loutItemDesc#, LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME = #loutItemNodePtrnIDName#, LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME = #loutItemPtrnIDName#, LOUTITEMPATHNAME = #loutItemPathName#, LOUTITEMLENCNT = #loutItemLenCnt#, LOUTITEMREFINFO = #loutItemRefInfo#, LOUTITEMREFINFO2 = #loutItemRefInfo2#, LOUTITEMSERNO = #loutItemSerno#, LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD = #loutItemOccurPtrnDstcd#, LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM = #loutItemMaxOccurNoitm#, LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM = #loutItemMinOccurNoitm#, LOUTITEMBASCVAL = #loutItemBascVal#, LOUTITEMMSKYN = #loutItemMskYn#, LOUTITEMMASKLENGTH = #loutItemMaskLength#, LYOUTDPTCNT = #lyoutDptCnt#, DECPTLENCNT = #decptLenCnt#, LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME = #lyoutItemRefPtrnIDName# WHERE LOUTNAME = #loutName# AND LOUTITEMNAME =#loutItemName# AND LOUTITEMSERNO =#loutItemSerno#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAITR08 ( LOUTNAME, LOUTITEMNAME, LOUTITEMSERNO, LOUTITEMIDNAME, PARNTLOUTITEMIDNAME, LOUTITEMDESC, LOUTITEMNODEPTRNIDNAME, LOUTITEMPTRNIDNAME, LOUTITEMPATHNAME, LOUTITEMLENCNT, LOUTITEMREFINFO, LOUTITEMREFINFO2, LOUTITEMOCCURPTRNDSTCD, LOUTITEMMAXOCCURNOITM, LOUTITEMMINOCCURNOITM, LOUTITEMBASCVAL, LOUTITEMMSKYN, LYOUTDPTCNT, DECPTLENCNT, LYOUTITEMREFPTRNIDNAME ) VALUES ( #loutName#, #loutItemName#, #loutItemSerno#, #loutItemIDName#, #parntLoutItemIDName#, #loutItemDesc#, #loutItemNodePtrnIDName#, #loutItemPtrnIDName#, #loutItemPathName#, #loutItemLenCnt#, #loutItemRefInfo#, #loutItemRefInfo2#, #loutItemOccurPtrnDstcd#, #loutItemMaxOccurNoitm#, #loutItemMinOccurNoitm#, #loutItemBascVal#, #loutItemMskYn#, #lyoutDptCnt#, #decptLenCnt#, #lyoutItemRefPtrnIDName# )

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAITR10 ( LOGPRCSSSEQNO, SEQNO, SERVICENAME ,COMMAND,LOUTNAME,RECVDATA,RECVAMNDHMS,PRCSSRSLT, PRCSSRSLTCMNT ) VALUES ( #logPrcssSeqno#, #seqno#, #serviceName# ,#command#,#loutName#,#recvData#,#recvAmndHMS#,#prcssRslt#, #prcssRsltCmnt# )
